Module kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem
Package kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.parts

Class AddPartController

java.lang.Object
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.parts.PartsController
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.parts.AddPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddPartController extends PartsController
Controller class to handle adding a new Part. Inherits from the base class PartsController. Upon a save event, calls a validation method and adds the part to Inventory.
Author:
Timothy Albert Kline

  • Method Details

    • handleSaveBtnEvent

      public void handleSaveBtnEvent(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles saving a new part. Calls validateInput() to verify user inputs are correct before adding a new part to Inventory. Returns to menu view if succeeds.
      Specified by:
      handleSaveBtnEvent in class PartsController
      Parameters:
      event - save button click. To redirect back to menu.
      Throws:
      Exception - if error logged from validateInputs(). Prevents adding part to inventory.
      See Also:
      • PartsController.validateInputs()
      • SceneManager.returnToMenu(ActionEvent)
